Yes, there are many yoga poses that can help in reducing stress and anxiety levels. Here are a few of them:

1. Child's Pose (Balasana): This pose is great for calming the mind and releasing tension in the body.

2. Standing Forward Bend (Uttanasana): This pose helps to release tension in the upper back, neck and shoulders, which can alleviate stress and anxiety.

3. Legs-Up-The-Wall Pose (Viparita Karani): This pose is great for calming the nervous system and reducing stress levels.

4. Corpse Pose (Savasana): This pose is great for relaxation and reducing stress and anxiety levels.

5. Eagle Pose (Garudasana): This pose helps to relieve stress by stretching the shoulders and upper back, which can become tense during periods of anxiety.

6. Cat-Cow Pose (Marjaryasana-Bitilasana): This pose is great for calming the mind and relieving stress and tension in the body.

Remember, practicing yoga regularly can help you gain the full benefits, so try to incorporate these poses into your daily routine.
